name: Perk Jump
description:
Did you think jumping up is easy? And what is it like when the whole world is against you? How much can you hold out and score points?

Climb higher and higher, constantly jumping from one platform to another. Have fun, but remember that every 30 platforms you will have a choice.

Features:

  • negative effects on the character - it's fun;

  • awesome bonuses that a character can collect;

  • dangerous obstacles to be avoided;

  • dangerous platforms for jumping;

  • Global leaderboards and fun achievements, which allows you to break your friends' records!

How to play

Move your finger around the screen to control the character

  • Keep in mind: this game sets fire to the fifth point!

  • Avoid the hasty and hasty choice!
